channel.title: Single Player
channel.description: Single Player level critiques and discussion.

item.title: Coming Soon...SP UT2k4 -Occupant-
item.author: invalid@example.com (Cyrsss Female Dog)
item.dc:creator: Cyrsss Female Dog
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

Name: -Occupant-

Yes an SP UT2k4 that I've worked on for the past year or so.

Will upload to the new 'Occupant' site sometime in January 2006

Story: The Llandri Corp. have dissovled,due to a massive finance buy-out by the Hellion/Skaarj cooperative.

Most Tournament Players captured/imprisoned and awaiting 'SingliationCloning' into 'Occupants' to fuel the Hellion/Skaarj army.

You,Player,are one of the captured and due to total 'Human' qualities are
left for...

Coming Soon...SP UT2k4 -Occupant-

item.title: Campaign
item.author: invalid@example.com (B-Z)
item.dc:creator: B-Z
item.content:encoded: How would you make a Singe player map pack, or campaign? I do understand how to make a single player map, but not a whole campaign. Is there any tutorials or something on that?

item.title: UT3 Single Player resources?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Lungri)
item.dc:creator: Lungri
item.content:encoded: I really love the U3 engine, but would like more options than just bots for something like a single player campaign. Anyone know if there's resources out there that people have made, custom enemies/whatever else?

item.title: Monster Hunt info-help thread.
item.author: invalid@example.com (ReD_Fist)
item.dc:creator: ReD_Fist
item.content:encoded:
I am not sure if there is a MH thread here.

But My first problem I was wondering about is, when I am online and server has that ujt mutator version .29? bt "zeal"
Well this happend a way long time ago too, but you cant move, only shoot on some maps.
I put the map in the editor and played it fine from there, so the only thing I think is that mutator is doing somthing bad.
It also makes my in game "say" have white letters allmost as if I am in spec mode.
Any ideas, ?

item.title: I challange all to beat this......
item.author: invalid@example.com (Rukee)
item.dc:creator: Rukee
item.content:encoded: When my DSL goes down(which is often) I like to play with the botts. Here is a game with 14 Godlike bots!! I challange all to post a screenshot beating 14 Godlike bots.....if you can......and if not post a screenshot as close as you can get!!

item.title: Looking for maps.
item.author: invalid@example.com (ThickAsABrick)
item.dc:creator: ThickAsABrick
item.content:encoded:
So...Has anyone here ever made a SP map? Perhaps something you haven't released, or perhaps you know of some interesting stuff?
Let me know! I'm always looking for new SP maps too play.

item.title: Stealing
item.author: invalid@example.com (Cyrss)
item.dc:creator: Cyrss
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I played a Mod a while ago and loved some the skin textures that where used.

I am thinking of using them in a SP.

I read the readme and no offer of using the textures for other mods existed.I emailed the address there to ask if I can use the textures,no reply.

I understand that many,if not all material made for the UNRed(X) software can be legally(blah) used/stolen for nonprofit maps/sp/etc.. but don't want to blatantly take/steal others work without sayso...

..can I use...

Stealing

item.title: SP Tutorials needed
item.author: invalid@example.com (Uncle_Bob)
item.dc:creator: Uncle_Bob
item.content:encoded: Could someone tell me some good tutorials for making SP maps for UT99 as I am planning to have a go at making one. Thanks

item.title: what do you like most?
item.author: invalid@example.com (l3hmi)
item.dc:creator: l3hmi
item.content:encoded:
what singleplayer"style" is your favorite?

do you like to be lost and totally alone, just you and your enemies in the level...

or do you like being together with some backup and fight in a team (not coop i mean bots)

item.title: Nightmare Asylum
item.author: invalid@example.com (Uncle_Bob)
item.dc:creator: Uncle_Bob
item.content:encoded:
This is going to be my first simgle player map ever. It started life as a Deathmatch level but I didn't really have that much mapping experience or skill so it didn't really go very well and I ended up giving up. I recently got the Monster Hunt mod and had an idea of Nightmare Asylum as and MH map where youre team statrt off in the depths of the Asylum and have to escape. I then thought why not make it single player! since there wasn't any improtant work for me to do I decided I would...

Nightmare Asylum

item.title: Edit Free Agents
item.author: invalid@example.com (l_veezy40)
item.dc:creator: l_veezy40
item.content:encoded:
In UT2004 single player, around the fith match, you can pick 5 free agents to add to you team. How do you change who is in that Free agent pool to pick from. I've got some skins I want to use, but they aren't there to be picked.
I added the menu="sp" in Xplayers, but no Free agents

item.title: Operation Na Pali LOW FPS
item.author: invalid@example.com (shirsoft)
item.dc:creator: shirsoft
item.content:encoded: I just downloaded onp and it looks promising , however it has a very poor fps of around 10. I have a geforcemx5200 128mb and 512 ram. UT runs fine on my comp , what could be the bug???
